venue.name: Ragged Mountain Resort (at the Six Pack Summit express lift)

item.description:
Back in the beginning of winter there was a Groupon for Ragged Mountain, well guess who bought one and never used it (maybe you did too)? Luckily with the storm that just passed there is plenty of snow to play in!

 

Right now there are tickets available from Liftopia for $40

http://store.liftopia.com/s/ragged-mountain-cloud-store

Otherwise I think they are $70 for a full day, you are responsible for buying your own ticket.

 

My friend and I are beginner snowboarders and will probably be sticking to greens all day unless I get restless and grab skis (in which case I'm up for blues and easier blacks).

Beginners are certainly welcome. Not many ski days left this year, let's get out and enjoy the snow!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in a blue shell with black pants and helmet, but my friend will be wearing a neon green helmet and pink clava, so look for her!
